thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com
thread.title: Patricia Halyard
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Patricia Halyard

author: Patricia Halyard
title: Patricia Halyard
text:
I ordered a gray wig but got a black one. The choices on the website was not clear. Please change that and make it very clear. I hope I won't have a problem sending this wig back, if so I'll never order from here again.
Also you need to make more gray wigs like this and more kinky ones too. We older ladies like the styles you make for the younger generation. Now they are wearing the gray color too. Make more!
Thanks
PS, I really like your wigs
